amendment.description: Amendment expresses the sense of Congress that-- (1) the intelligence community should be revitalized by investing in the missions, people, and capabilities of the community; and (2) the efforts of the men and women of the intelligence community should be recognized and commended.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered five printed in House Report 108-561 to express the sense of Congress in support of the efforts of the intelligence community.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rogers (MI) amendment Agreed to by recorded vote: 222 - 195 (Roll no. 293).
